bullets: Engineered new service component for SAP's AI platform "AI Core" enabling cost-efficient serving of fine-tuned LLMs
Acted as Scrum Master, leading agile ceremonies to enhance and improve development process
Implemented full-stack features for the cross-product integration project "SAP Start" using SAP's recommended technology stack (SAP CAP, SAP UI5, and HANA Cloud)
Reduced manual configuration efforts of "SAP Start" by enhancing its setup automation
Collaborated with multiple product teams to integrate their services with "SAP Start" developing content and solving integration challenges
